item.description:
The Conntecticut and Middletown GOP is hosting the Elk Lodge Precinct from 6-8 PM on Friday 1/25 evening (Rain or Shine). They are also making a significant contribution to the Connecticut Breast Cancer Coalition / Foundation.
Elks Lodge
44 Maynard St.
Middletown, CT

Please arrive at 5:30 if you can.

Up to date details can be found here: Middletown Straw Poll

Note:
We need a speaker to talk on behalf of the Ron Paul Campaign (5 min Max)
Please contact: Dave Anderson - danderson12@snet.net
item.why: We need to show our support of the Ron Paul Revolution!
item.name: Middletown Straw Poll.
